knimeNode.name: Tree Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loads an input tree file (eg. Newick or PhyloXML format) tree as a table. Not all PhyloXML markup is supported.

fullDescription.intro: Loads an input tree file (eg. Newick or PhyloXML format) tree as a table. Not all PhyloXML markup is supported. The tree is output as a "flat" table of node -> parent rows with annotation details, where available, in the remaining columns.
fullDescription.option: Enter the newick/phyloxml/nexus file which you wish to read. It will not be modified.

ports.outPort: The loaded tree topology and annotation

views.view: Load the tree view into Archaeopteryx. See www.phyloxml.org for details.
